WorkItem.Description:
Test (plain read/write):
----
$excel = PHPExcel_IOFactory::load('read.xlsx');
 
$writer = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($excel, 'Excel2007');
$writer->save('write.xlsx');
 
Expected result:
----
write.xlsx looks like read.xlsx
 
Actual result:
----
First segment of Rich-Text string uses wrong font in write.xlsx
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.7.2
WorkItem.Summary: First segment of Rich-Text not read correctly by PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007
